MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH15 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Bath Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.44pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Rosefield Avenue Lane substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.57pm on Monday 1st March 2021.
